thread.title: Hailey Bieber Flaunts Bikini Backshot With Expensive Accessory
thread.title_full: Hailey Bieber Flaunts Bikini Backshot With Expensive Accessory

author: Amanda Lynne
title: Hailey Bieber Flaunts Bikini Backshot With Expensive Accessory
text:
Hailey Bieber is heading into 2024 in style. The model and wife of singer Justin Bieber took to her the bathing suit look with some exciting jewelry as she posed seductively for the camera.
In the post, Bieber is wearing a green bikini with yellow trim. The top featured thin straps tied around her neck and behind her back, showcasing her toned arms and shoulders. Meanwhile, the thong bottoms did little to hide her curvy backside while putting the spotlight on her tiny waist and incredibly toned legs. She wore a glowing makeup look, which included full, pink lips.
Hailey Bieber Flashes Incredible Curves for First 2024 Snaps
The model posed on a yacht for the
bikini snaps as she sported rings on her fingers, gold hoop earrings, and a pair of dark sunglasses. She also added a knit bucket hat to cover up her hair. However, it was her body chain that really stole the show. The gold and diamond chain wrapped around her neck fell down her chest and enveloped her waist.
According to
Page Six, Hailey Bieber’s body chain was made by Jacquie Aiche and cost around $16,000. The outlet reveals that Bieber is a fan of the jeweler’s work and has worn similar body chains along with her bikini looks in the past.
Meanwhile, Bieber’s 50.8 million followers didn’t hold back when it came to showing their love for
the racy post. The snaps earned 2.2 million likes and more than 8,800 comments in less than 24 hours after they were published to her account. “GORGEOUS QUEEN,” one person commented. “You’re an absolute goddess,” another person said. “Body is bodyiiiiing,” a third comment read. “It’s the Brazilian bikinis for me,” another social media user stated.
It looks like Hailey Bieber is heading into 2024 with the same energy she left 2023 with, and her fans are ready to enjoy the ride with her.
